channel.title: rileyjshaw
channel.description: The work and diatribes of rileyjshaw

item.title: All of which are American dreams
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: I wrote some scripts which let you view someone else's Twitter feed.

item.title: Khan Academy: a new employee's primer
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: I work at Khan Academy now and I like it here.

item.title: How to generate a static site from a folder of assets using Gulp
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: Learn how to create a static site with internal links based on a directory of files of any type.

item.title: The pool on the roof must have a leak
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: I joined Open Whisper Systems to pitch in on the TextSecure Chrome extension. It was the experience of a lifetime.

item.title: Graphing depth
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: On a beautiful summer's afternoon while all the other children were playing outside I made pictures out of procedural hobby math.

item.title: Stealing history with CSS binary trees
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: Some shady CSS tricks form like Voltron to discover your darkest secrets.

item.title: Riddle: chicken prices
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: I wrote a comment on Hacker News that people liked.

item.title: Fin?
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: I was so ready to stop iron-blogging that I didn't publish my last post.

item.title: The cat's-whisker detector
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: A history lesson: the cat's-whisker radio was the first commercial semiconductor device. It sparked an industry that fundamentally changed the way we communicate.

item.title: Accidental reset
item.dc:creator: rileyjshaw
item.description: Sometimes, all you need is a small rubber washer.
